attributes.action: Hold a new referendum to decide if the U.K. should rejoin the European Union
attributes.additional_details: Brexit has been a disaster for the U.K. economy and the government should allow the electorate to reverse Brexit at the earliest opportunity by means of a new referendum.
attributes.background: Parliament should pass a bill to bring about a new referendum that asks the question “should the United Kingdom rejoin the European Union “

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625314
